content: this pattern has a video tutorial to accompany description pattern worked from top down with a 6 row repeat creating puffs and flowers material any weight yarn with hook size up 1-2 sizes from recommended size for a better drape i used 6mm hook and approx 750 yds of 4 weight yarn in yarn bee - luxe lollies measured 66 inches wide by 31 inches long why just buy one get more patterns and save more buy 2 for 20% off buy 3 for 30% off buy 4 or more for 40% off youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucu27-xjgrqpr3pxsngbi3ig like us on facebook https //www facebook com/jolieknotscrochet/ view_public_f… join the jolie knots crochet community facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/2541380872756259/ instagram https //www instagram com/jolieknotscrochet/ hl=en
